website_summaries.verdict: Small claw hammer has a good grip and head designed to help start nails.
pros: Magnet to make starting nails easier
Good hammer for working in small spaces
Best for tacking staples and small nails
Good for household projects like hanging pictures
cons: This mini-hammer works best for minor household tasks rather than really big jobs

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my little hammer. It can fit in my drawer in my kitchen next to my screwdriver for a quick little job. It is a small hammer but it is very well made. Very sturdy and I believe easier to use then my larger hammer. My husband even used it with his big hands and said he liked it. I can’t state enough how sturdy and well made this little hammer is. I will put it next to our Apple TV remote so you can see the actual size. Don’t hesitate to purchase just because of its size.
customer_reviews.author: ShellieT

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad arthritis and neuropathy in both of my hands. As a result, using a regular size hammer for anything is VERY challenging. This little hammer is absolutely perfect,
customer_reviews.author: Linda White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome in tight spaces. I’ve been using this hammer to tack down wire staples. Works awesome! Compact fits in my tool bag fine. No need to lug my large framing hammer to tack staples. My boss was making fun I’ve my little hammer, but I said it’s not the size that matter, it’s how you use it. He’s just jealous he doesn’t have one. The only thing I might change about this hammer is to increase the surface area of the head.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Surprising
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't convinced I'd like this. But my arthritis had me choking up on the hammer I have, and that was harder yet. This ugly little thing definitely fits the bill. It's grip fits my hand (very large for woman, but men have bigger ones, I'm told). The hammer is light enough to not hurt my wrist, but gets the job done. I bought this expecting to return it. I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolle

customer_reviews.title: A hammer just for my female hands!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! A hammer made with my tiny hands in mind. Perfect for small jobs like hanging pictures. Fits nicely in my kitchen junk drawer so it's always close by. I may get another to keep in my car for self defense!
customer_reviews.author: Po' Mrs Barlow ;)

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old, huge hammer that was taking up too much room in my toolbox. It's a great little tool with all the power of a larger hammer. Nice handle, and I love the magnetic part on the top. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: K.M. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice little hammer.
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit it, I LOVE tools. Had to have this little ditty. It's great for small jobs like hanging pictures and/or pulling nails from the wall. The head is normal size and it feels heavy and well-balanced, but I wouldn't use it to drive nails into wood or general contract work.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I have found this smallish hammer to be very useful while out in the field. It is comfortable and easy to hold. Its coloring makes it easy to find unless it's laying in solid orange. Expect solid utility and great value for your dollar. It's not a toy. However, your kids or grandkids could easily use it. This tool makes a welcome addition to my tool kit. Own it. - daFigzTM
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Best Hammer EVER
customer_reviews.text: Long hammers are a thing of the past!! I am an interior decorator and I got tired of lugging around my giant hammer, plus I needed a smaller one to be able to hammer into small spaces without damaging walls, furniture, etc.. This hammer is SIMPLY AMAZING! Life changing! Haha! It is heavy & sturdy enough for both big and small jobs. I wish I would have found this years ago! It also saves space in your toolbox! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyW

customer_reviews.title: Little hammer, BIG Punch
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate tool to have in your toolbox as far as hammers goes. Forget the fact that it actually has a holder for your nail and instead concentrating the fact that for it's tiny size it has quite a dense head to it making it a great tool for both fasteners and demo. Tacklife has turned out to have quite a surprising number of tools and various categories all of which I have purchased and all perform as brand name tools would. And at price points that are far below normal brand pricing
customer_reviews.author: D. Quanstrom

product_meta.title: TACKLIFE Stubby Claw Hammer with Magnetic Nail Starter 8 Oz Small Mini Hammers and Nails Tool-HMH2A
product_meta.description:
TACKLIFE Stuby Claw Hammer with Magnetic Nail Starter 8 Oz Small Mini Hammers and Nails Tool-HMH2A

Magnetic Nail Starter
Handy and sturdy hammer takes with magnet, which can absorb nails or other metal fittings with great control; magnetic nail holder for easy start with one-handed operation

Comfortable Handle
Anti-slip soft rubber handle provides comfortable sense of grip and less fatigue.

Hanging Hole Design
Hanging hole design in the tail, the hammer can be used with lanyard, easy to carry and hang on the wall.

Easy to Use
Streamlined cutting increase the hardness, which can pull up the nails without any effort; widely used in small home repair, DIY, woodwork, family projects, emergencies, and outdoor camping activities, suitable for both women and kids. And compared to large hammer, our mini hammer is extreme compact to fit in hand nicely, perfect for using in tight space

Superior Quality
The claw hammer comes with high-frequency quenching and hardness steel, providing you a good hammering experience; featured with Anti-Rust oil, can be used in wet environment for a long time without worrying about exposing to air and water directly

About Tacklife
At Tacklife, we aim to manufacture the best products that inspire our consumers to live a more convenient, secure lifestyle. We have our professional products monitoring team to focus on every single detail that matters to you and develop well-made, portable, exquisite products.

Why Choose Tacklife
Every TACKLIFE tool is thoroughly inspected and tested before leaving the factory. If you have any quality problems, please write to us through Amazon. TACKLIFE support team will solve your problems in time.
feature_bullets: Please feel free to contact us if you have any problem!

▲【Magnetic Nail Starter】Treat with strong magnetic, the hammer can absorb nails or other metal fittings easily
▲【Easy to Use】Stubby claw was treat with streamlined cutting, can easy to pull up the nails quickly and perfectly

▲【Wide Application】Widely used in home repair, DIY, building, woodwork, small family projects, and outdoor camping activities. Compared to large hammer, our mini hammer is extreme compact to fit in hand nicely, perfect for using in tight space
